content:
A Variation:
Hi [Name],

{Email Personalization Variable 2}

Comparative is an analytics solution for payment processors that can help reduce the time and cost to deliver insights by 10x, while eliminating analyst backlog.

Unlike the complex, slow, and expensive BI tools of the last 20 years, Comparative is a significant evolution in analytics. To get a feel for how it works, check out this 2-minute demo that shows how we analyze key metrics such as the number of transactions completed.

{Interested in learning | Curious to know | Want to learn} more? We offer a 30-day pilot and would be happy to chat about how Comparative can help your payment processing needs. Let me know what time works best for you.

Happy Watching!

B Variation:
Hey [Name],

{Email Personalization Variable 2}

Eliminate analyst backlog and reduce the time and cost to deliver insights by 10x with Comparative, an analytics solution designed for payment processors.

Unlike the complex, slow, and expensive BI tools of the past two decades, Comparative offers a significant evolution in analytics. To get a better understanding of how it works, check out this 2-minute demo showcasing how we analyze key metrics like the number of transactions requested.

{Interested in learning | Curious to know | Want to learn} more? We offer a 30-day pilot and would love to chat about how Comparative can improve your payment processing. Let me know what time works for you.

Happy Watching!
